Field Properties

Zelix KlassMaster lets you change a field's
  • name.
  • access modifier (i.e. default, public, protected or private).
  • other modifiers (i.e. static, final, volatile and transient).
Press to make the change or press to undo a change.

Warning

Zelix KlassMaster performs only minimal checking to ensure that any changes you make to a field's modifiers are valid. It is your responsibility. However, it is generally safe to increase a field's access modifier or to switch off its final modifier.
